io.leonis.subra.math

Interface PlayerCommandGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.leonis.algieba.algebra.Group<PlayerCommand>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PSDFormationDeducer

    public interface PlayerCommandGroup
extends io.leonis.algieba.algebra.Group<PlayerCommand>
    The Class PlayerCommandGroup. This class contains the functionality for transforming PlayerCommand.
